name: Polar Penguin Racer
description:
Story

Penguins are very playful birds, so when winter fell upon Penguland, the Penguins immediately began to make a racetrack out of the large Polar Ice Creams they found lying around their Pengudom (Kingdom). They built the ultimate racetrack and went about to race through the obstacles. The one who would beat the challenge first would be crowned the ultimate penguin, and be given an unlimited supply of Polar Icecreams! Can you get your penguin to beat the racetrack?

How To Play

Name your penguin friend and get on the icy race track! Patiently wait for the right time and press ‘SPACE’ to run past the obstacles. Make sure you don’t hit any of the obstacles, or else you will re-spawn at your last checkpoint And whatever you do, do NOT let the time run out, or let your friend win!

AI Players

There can’t be a race without an opponent, unless you’re practicing. Pick your Penguin Opponent (who will be played by your computer) and run past the obstacles before it does! Beat the computer player and become the ultimate penguin of Penguland!

PC REQUIREMENTS Minimum Requirements
  • Processor: Core i3 3220
  • RAM: 8GB
  • GPU: Inernal
Recommended Requirements
  • Processor: Core i5 7500
  • RAM: 16GB
  • GPU: GTX 1650
